ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION.sling:message: You can delete your Visit Saudi account. All your account information will be permanently deleted.

AN_ERROR_OCCURRED_WHILE_LOADING_THIS_SEC.sling:message: An error occurred while loading this section

BOOKING_CONFIRMATION_DESCRIPTION.sling:message: A confirmation email with your booking details has been sent to your email address

BOOKING_EMAIL_CONFIRMATION.sling:message: Your payment is complete. A confirmation email with your booking details has been sent to your email

BOOKING_ERROR_CODE_100.sling:message: Transaction cost or currency not valid

BOOKING_ERROR_CODE_119.sling:message: Original transaction can not be voided

BOOKING_ERROR_CODE_122.sling:message: Continuous authority not available on referenced transaction

BOOKING_ERROR_CODE_303.sling:message: Card is for ATM use only

BOOKING_ERROR_CODE_307.sling:message: Card security code (CVV) and address (AVS) mismatch

BOOKING_ERROR_CODE_308.sling:message: Card is not enabled for e-commerce

BOOKING_ERROR_CODE_309.sling:message: 3DSecure authentication not available for this card

BOOKING_ERROR_DESCRIPTION.sling:message: An error occurred while processing your payment. Please ensure that all information is correct before trying again.

BOOKING_SUPPORTED_METHODS_TITLE.sling:message: We support the following payment methods

CREATE_TRIP_HOW_MANY_DAYS.sling:message: How many days are you staying?

DELETE_TRIP_ALERT_MESSAGE.sling:message: This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to continue?

DISCOVER_ACTIVITIES_ON_MAP_MESSAGE.sling:message: Discover the latest events and top attractions, directly on the map

EDIT_TRIP_ALERT_MESSAGE.sling:message: The changes you made will impact the trip schedule including the activities or events you may have already added

ENABLE_GPS_DESCRIPTION.sling:message: GPS is disabled in your device. Enable it?

EVENTS_FILTERS_NO_FOUND_BODY.sling:message: Try changing some filters to find what you are looking for.

FORCE_UPDATE_TO_LATEST_VERSION.sling:message: We have released a new update to our app. To continue using it, you must update it to the latest version.

GAME_CHECK_ARRIVAL_MESSAGE.sling:message: Did you arrive to \{{1}}? Please tap the check in button to unlock your rewards

GAME_FINISH_FAIL_DESCRIPTION.sling:message: It seems that you are not in \{{1}}. To unlock your rewards, you must checkin in the city!

GAME_FINISH_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION.sling:message: You have successfully unlocked a full list of rewards. Enjoy discounts on dining, attractions, cafes, beauty and fitness products!

GAME_INTERMEDIATE_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION.sling:message: You have successfully checked in \{{1}}. Your next destination is \{{2}}.

GAME_NEXT_DESTINATION_ANNOUNCEMENT.sling:message: Please head to \{{1}} and check in there

GAME_START_FAIL_DESCRIPTION.sling:message: It seems that you are already in \{{1}}. Only people from outside the city can participate.

GAME_START_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION.sling:message:
You have successfully checked in. Please come back when you arrive to \{{1}}.
Safe travel!

GAME_STEP1_DESCRIPTION.sling:message: Start your journey from any city by checking in your departure/’s location

GAME_STEP2_DESCRIPTION.sling:message: Arrive to your destination and verify that by checking in your location

GAME_STEP3_DESCRIPTION.sling:message: Discounts on dining, attractions, cafes, beauty and fitness

GAMES_HOMEPAGE_TITLE.sling:message: Exclusive discounts when traveling in Saudi Arabia

IT_IS_REQUIRED_TO_COMPLETE_YOUR_BOOKING.sling:message: It is required to complete your booking

LOCATION_DENIED_MESSAGE.sling:message: Please make sure that location is enabled from your settings

LOGOUT_ALERT_DESCRIPTION.sling:message: You can always access your account back by signing back in
